title: Infrastructural Facilities - All the infrastructural facilities required in site as specified by the Authority, shall be provided by the owner / developer at his own cost on the site
clause_text: Infrastructural Facilities - All the infrastructural facilities required in site as specified by the Authority, shall be provided by the owner / developer at his own cost on the site. Proper arrangement for treatment and disposal of sewage and solid waste shall be made. No untreated effluent shall be allowed to pass into any watercourse.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
